name: INVADING
description:
The hero who has infiltrated one person to an unknown place ...

It is an annihilation of the enemy so that the target can not be found!

A stealth bullet-hell shooter game attacked by a unique barrage when found in enemies!

(As the author is a Japanese, the translation of the Eng"r"ish part may be strange...)

Posting of play videos to the video site etc. of this game, live broadcast etc are welcome.

When playing in the browser, please play with full screen.
